methods.name: vision
title: Google
Cloud#vision
methods.description: Creates a new object for connecting to the Vision service. Each call creates a new connection.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision

image = vision.image "path/to/landmark.jpg"

landmark = image.landmark
landmark.description #=> "Mount Rushmore"

examples.caption: The default scope can be overridden with the scope option:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud  = Google::Cloud.new
platform_scope = "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform"
vision = gcloud.vision scope: platform_scope

params.name: scope
params.description:
The OAuth 2.0 scopes controlling the set of resources and operations that the connection can access. See Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs.

The default scope is:

  • https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform

params.name: timeout
params.description: Default timeout to use in requests. Optional.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A hash of values to override the default
behavior of the API client. Optional.

methods.name: vision
title: Google
Cloud.vision
methods.description: Creates a new object for connecting to the Vision service. Each call creates a new connection.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

vision = Google::Cloud.vision

image = vision.image "path/to/landmark.jpg"

landmark = image.landmark
landmark.description #=> "Mount Rushmore"

params.name: project_id
params.description:
Project identifier for the Vision service you
are connecting to. If not present, the default project for the
credentials is used.

params.name: credentials
params.description: The path to the keyfile as a String, the contents of the keyfile as a Hash, or a Google::Auth::Credentials object. (See Vision::Credentials)

params.name: scope
params.description:
The OAuth 2.0 scopes controlling the set of resources and operations that the connection can access. See Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs.

The default scope is:

  • https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform

params.name: timeout
params.description: Default timeout to use in requests. Optional.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A hash of values to override the default
behavior of the API client. Optional.
